item.title: Routine
item.author: Kamil
item.description: They say that habits are our second nature. Things which we do repeatedly are like pre-programmed functions which trigger specific time or action. Morning coffee. I simply cannot start the day without a cup of a real coffee. That was the reason why I bought the actual bean to coffee machine, because of the taste and smell of real coffee. Prepared in the exact way I like it. This week I’ve ran out of the time in the morning and couldn’t make my favourite coffee, so I used the instant one.
